author: Julia Lee
excerpt: The best gifts all compiled into one easy guide
text: To progress in Hello Kitty Island Adventure, you’ll need to rank up your friendship levels with every character inhabiting the island by giving them gifts. Doing so will unlock tons of things — like upgrades to crafting stations, recipes for certain items, and even other characters — so make sure to gift characters every day.To help you figure out what to gift the various characters, we’ve compiled a list for you, broken up by the best gift to give them and a good early-game option when you don’t have a ton of resources. Note that as of this writing, some characters have different “best” gifts for them on the Nintendo Switch version of the game. (An update aligning the gifting point system across platforms will come to the Switch on May 22.)We also list all the later unlockable characters under a cut for spoiler reasons. html:
To progress in Hello Kitty Island Adventure, you’ll need to rank up your friendship levels with every character inhabiting the island by giving them gifts. Doing so will unlock tons of things — like upgrades to crafting stations, recipes for certain items, and even other characters — so make sure to gift characters every day.

To help you figure out what to gift the various characters, we’ve compiled a list for you, broken up by the best gift to give them and a good early-game option when you don’t have a ton of resources. Note that as of this writing, some characters have different “best” gifts for them on the Nintendo Switch version of the game. (An update aligning the gifting point system across platforms will come to the Switch on May 22.)

We also list all the later unlockable characters under a cut for spoiler reasons. Some of these characters have shown up in trailers and whatnot for the game, but we don’t want to dampen any of the surprises for you.

Below, we explain the best gifts for the various Hello Kitty Island Adventure characters and how to make them (or get their recipes).

Table of Contents

  • Badtz-maru’s best gifts
  • Chococat’s best gifts
  • Cinnamoroll’s best gifts
  • Hangyodon’s best gifts
  • Hello Kitty’s best gifts
  • Keroppi’s best gifts
  • Kuromi’s best gifts
  • My Melody’s best gifts
  • Pekkle’s best gifts
  • Pochacco’s best gifts
  • Pompompurin’s best gifts
  • Retsuko’s best gifts
  • Tuxedo Sam’s best gifts
  • Best gifts for characters unlocked via quests (spoiler)

Badtz-maru’s best gifts

Graphic: Julia Lee/Polygon | Image sources: Sunblink via Polygon

Favorite gift: Ultimate Joke Pizza (dough + pineapple + tofu at the pizza oven)

Best gift for raising friendship (Nintendo Switch only): Quattro Formaggi Pizza (dough + moon cheese + coral milk in the pizza oven)

Good early-game gift: Pineapple Pizza (dough + pineapple)

Gift reward: Paper

Max friendship level: 20

Badtz-maru is one of the starting characters at Seaside Resort, most often hanging out at his comic book stand on the docks.

Chococat’s best gifts

Graphic: Julia Lee/Polygon | Image sources: Sunblink via Polygon

Favorite gift: Interactive History of Chocolate (a crafting table recipe unlocked from friendship level three with TOPHAT)

Best gift for raising friendship (Nintendo Switch only): Interactive History of Chocolate

Good early-game gift: Blank Book

Gift reward: Gizmos

Max friendship level: 15

Chococat is one of the starting characters at Seaside Resort. He usually hangs out around the crafting table.

Cinnamoroll’s best gifts

Graphic: Julia Lee/Polygon | Image sources: Sunblink via Polygon

Favorite gift: Chocolate Chai (candlenut+ chocolate coin + magma bloom/cinna bloom in the espresso machine)

Best gift for raising friendship (Nintendo Switch only): Spicy Pumpkin Latte (candlenut + cinna bloom + pumpkin in the espresso machine)

Good early-game gift: Spicy Pizza (dough + cinna bloom/magma bloom in the pizza oven)

Gift reward: Candy Clouds

Max friendship level: 20

Cinnamoroll roams around the island, speeding off to various locations to make deliveries.

Hangyodon’s best gifts

Graphic: Julia Lee/Polygon | Image sources: Sunblink via Polygon

Favorite gift: Mermaid Figure (crafting table recipe unlocked via friendship level 13 with My Melody)

Best gift for raising friendship (Nintendo Switch only): Mermaid Figure

Good early-game gift: Rare-tagged aquatic fish (Sandy Puffler, Galaxy Grouper, Briny Clamfish)

Gift reward: Candlenut

Max friendship level: 15

Hangyodon is only accessible once you unlock swimming and diving.

Hello Kitty’s best gifts

Graphic: Julia Lee/Polygon | Image sources: Sunblink via Polygon

Favorite gift: Red Bow Apple Pie (flour + apple + magma bloom in the oven)

Best gift for raising friendship (Nintendo Switch only): The Future of Everything (crafting table recipe found in a chest on Cloud Island, requires friendship level two with Lala)

Good early-game gift: Strawberry Shortcake (flour + strawberry in the oven)

Gift reward: Tofu

Max friendship level: 25

Hello Kitty is one of the starting characters at Seaside Resort, most often found at her cafe.

Keroppi’s best gifts

Graphic: Julia Lee/Polygon | Image sources: Sunblink via Polygon

Favorite gift: Critter Totem (crafting table recipe unlocked via friendship rank 10 with Keroppi)

Best gift for raising friendship (Nintendo Switch only): Swampy Music Box (crafting table recipe found in a treasure chest near the Nature Preserve)

Good early-game gift: Bush Fiend critter (caught from evening to night in the Spooky Swamp hedge maze)

Gift reward: Sugarkelp

Max friendship level: 15

Keroppi lives in the Spooky Swamp, though you can often find him hanging out at Badtz-maru’s comic shop.

Kuromi’s best gifts

Graphic: Julia Lee/Polygon | Image sources: Sunblink via Polygon

Favorite gift: Pumpkin Spice Soda (fizzy crystal + pumpkin + cinna bloom in the soda machine)

Best gift for raising friendship (Nintendo Switch only): Spicy Pumpkin Latte (candlenut + cinna bloom + pumpkin in the espresso machine)

Good early-game gift: Pumpkin Pie (flour + pumpkin in the oven)

Gift reward: Light stone

Max friendship level: 20

Kuromi lives in Spooky Swamp and she’s most often found in her potion hut.

My Melody’s best gifts

Graphic: Julia Lee/Polygon | Image sources: Sunblink via Polygon

Favorite gift: Pink Clouds Ice Cream (cactus cream + candy cloud + sakura in the dessert machine)

Best gift for raising friendship (Nintendo Switch only): Starry Skies Shake (cactus cream + snowcicle + starfruit in the dessert machine) or Quattro Formaggi Pizza (dough + moon cheese + coral milk in the pizza oven)

Good early-game gift: Pink Latte (candlenut + strawberry/sakura in the espresso machine)

Gift reward: Flour

Max friendship level: 20

My Melody is one of the starting characters at Seaside Resort, commonly found at her furniture shop.

Pekkle’s best gifts

Graphic: Julia Lee/Polygon | Image sources: Sunblink via Polygon

Favorite gift: Mountain Soundtrack (crafting table recipe unlocked via friendship level eight with Retsuko)

Best gift for raising friendship (Nintendo Switch only): Mountain Soundtrack

Good early-game gift: Calming Crystal (found in the Crystal Caves)

Gift reward: Feather

Max friendship level: 20

Pekkle can be found at Gemstone Mountain, in front of the dance hall.

Pochacco’s best gifts

Graphic: Julia Lee/Polygon | Image sources: Sunblink via Polygon

Favorite gift: Pochacco Energy Pop (fizzy crystal + spinip + tofu in the soda machine)

Best gift for raising friendship (Nintendo Switch only): Pochacco Energy Pop

Good early-game gift: Tofu bread (flour + tofu in the oven)

Gift reward: Strawberries

Max friendship level: 20

Pochacco is one of the starting characters who can be found around Seaside Resort.

Pompompurin’s best gifts

Graphic: Julia Lee/Polygon | Image sources: Sunblink via Polygon

Favorite gift: Mama’s Pudding (cactus cream + banana + coral milk in the dessert machine)

Best gift for raising friendship (Nintendo Switch only): Starry Skies Shake (cactus cream + snowcicle + starfruit in the dessert machine)

Good early-game gift: Dessert Pizza (dough + candy cloud/sugarkelp/swampmallow in the pizza oven)

Gift reward: Bananas

Max friendship level: 20

Pompompurin hangs out at Gemstone Mountain, in or around his dessert boat.

Retsuko’s best gifts

Graphic: Julia Lee/Polygon | Image sources: Sunblink via Polygon

Favorite gift: Volcanic Guitar (crafting table recipe unlocked via friendship level four with TOPHAT)

Best gift for raising friendship (Nintendo Switch only): Sounds of Steel (crafting table recipe found in a chest in the lava caves)

Good early-game gift: Ingots, but more preferably a Volcano Soundtrack (crafting table recipe found in a lava caves treasure chest)

Gift reward: Dough

Max friendship level: 20

Retsuko is typically at Mount Hothead, lamenting her lost luggage. Once you help her out, she’ll move to hang around the hot springs.

Tuxedo Sam’s best gifts

Graphic: Julia Lee/Polygon | Image sources: Sunblink via Polygon

Favorite gift: Designer Island Doll (crafting table recipe unlocked via friendship rank 16 with My Melody)

Best gift for raising friendship (Nintendo Switch only): The Future of Everything (crafting table recipe found in a chest on Cloud Island, requires friendship level two with Lala)

Good early-game gift: Any tropical fish with the “rare” tag (coastal clamfish, tropical sunfish, and summer sole)

Gift reward: Thread

Max friendship level: 15

Tuxedo Sam is one of the starting characters, nearly always found in his clothing shop.

The characters below unlock via certain story quests. Spoilers will be below the image.

Graphic: Julia Lee/Polygon | Image sources: Sunblink via Polygon

Best gifts for characters unlocked via quests (spoiler)

Wish me mell’s best gifts

Graphic: Julia Lee/Polygon | Image sources: Sunblink via Polygon

Favorite gift: Any rare candle (creation station recipe unlocked via friendship level 10 with Wish me mell)

Best gift for raising friendship (Nintendo Switch only): Rare candle

Good early gift: Any rare-tagged fish (bog clamfish, burning perch, cavern clamfish, etc.)

Gift reward: Honeycomb

Max friendship level: 20

To unlock Wish me mell, you’ll need to hit friendship rank 11 with My Melody and complete the “Dessert-ed Boat,” “Parched,” and “Revive the Oasis” quests. After this, the questline “Curious Caverns” will unlock, eventually leading you to her.

My Sweet Piano’s best gifts

Graphic: Julia Lee/Polygon | Image sources: Sunblink via Polygon

Favorite gift: Colorful Lamb Plush (crafting table recipe unlocked via friendship rank 10 with My Sweet Piano)

Best gift for raising friendship (Nintendo Switch only): Quattro Formaggi Pizza (dough + moon cheese + coral milk in the pizza oven)

Good early gift: Critter Totem (crafting table recipe unlocked via friendship level 10 with Keroppi)

Gift reward: Wool

Max friendship level: 20

To unlock My Sweet Piano, you’ll need to reach friendship rank 15 with My Melody and complete the quest series that begins with “A Friend Indeed.”

Big Challenges’ best gifts

Graphic: Julia Lee/Polygon | Image sources: Sunblink via Polygon

Favorite gift: The Greatest Challenge (crafting table recipe unlocked via friendship rank 4 with Lala)

Best gift for raising friendship (Nintendo Switch only): The Future of Everything (crafting table recipe found in a chest on Cloud Island, requires friendship level two with Lala)

Good early gift: Meditations on Resilience (crafting table recipe unlocked via friendship rank two with Big Challenges)

Gift reward: Little Challenges

Max friendship level: 20

To unlock Big Challenges, you’ll need to complete the story quests that lead up to Icy Peak, which functionally involves “fixing” all the island’s areas and earning their respective Star Fragments.

TOPHAT’s best gifts

Graphic: Julia Lee/Polygon | Image sources: Sunblink via Polygon

Favorite gift: The Future of Everything (crafting table recipe found in a chest on Cloud Island, requires friendship level two with Lala)

Best gift for raising friendship (Nintendo Switch only): The Future of Everything

Good early-game gift: Candied Banana Coffee (candlenut + candy cloud + banana in the espresso machine)

Gift reward: Glitches

Max friendship level: 10

TOPHAT will start showing up as a buddy once you clear Big Challenge’s storyline above.

Lala’s best gifts

Graphic: Julia Lee/Polygon | Image sources: Sunblink via Polygon

Favorite gift: Quattro Formaggi Pizza (dough + moon cheese + coral milk in the pizza oven)

Best gift for raising friendship (Nintendo Switch only): Quattro Formaggi Pizza

Good early-game gift: Almond Pound Cake (flour + candy cloud + toasted almond in the oven)

Gift reward: Stardust

Max friendship level: 20

While Lala will show up in snippets of the story before you really meet them, you can only start gifting them once you unlock Cloud Island — which happens after saving Big Challenges, hitting rank 17 friendship with Hello Kitty, completing her given quests, and then completing the “Stargazing” quest.

Kiki’s best gifts

Graphic: Julia Lee/Polygon | Image sources: Sunblink via Polygon

Favorite gift: Starry Skies Shake (cactus cream + snowcicle + starfruit in the dessert machine)

Best gift for raising friendship (Nintendo Switch only): Starry Skies Shake

Good early-game gift: Almond Pound Cake (flour + candy cloud + toasted almond in the oven)

Gift reward: Stardust

Max friendship level: 20

Kiki unlocks via the same method as Lala above.

Usahana’s best gifts (iOS only)

Graphic: Julia Lee/Polygon | Image sources: Sunblink via Polygon

Favorite gift: Rainbow Dango (rainbow beam + 3 mochi)

Good early-game gift: Colorpillar critter

Gift reward: Rice

Max friendship level: 20

Usahana is a character locked to the Apple Arcade version of Hello Kitty Island Adventure for now, but she will come to the other versions at a later, unannounced date. Since I play the Steam version of the game, Usahana’s information is compiled with help from the Hello Kitty Island Adventure Wiki.
